extension.name: Preload Resources - Gantry Atom (Helium)
extension.author: Andreas Kar
extension.description:
Preload Resources - Atom for Gantry Framework

 Andreas Kar (andreas.kar@gmx.at)

NOTE: This Atom was installed for Gantry Helium.
If you want to install the Atom for a different Gantry template, you must place the files as follows:

  • *.yaml => /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles
  • *.twig => /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles
Repository: https://git.io/fjVkM
Website: https://gantryprojects.com
